# Beijing Pop Music Awards

The Beijing Pop Music Awards (), formerly known as Chinese Music Radio Awards () between 2000 and 2006, is a Chinese music awards founded by Beijing Music Radio in 1993 to recognize Chinese popular music. It was on hiatus from 2013-2017 before resuming in 2018 as Global Chinese Pop Chart Awards ().
